Installation
============

.. code-block:: text

    $ pip install todofcpy

Most useful links
-----------------
- Current pypi version: https://pypi.org/project/todofcpy/
- Project homepage: https://todofootballclub.com/
- Repository: https://github.com/Robinhoets/soccer-py
- Issue tracker: https://github.com/Robinhoets/soccer-py/issues

  :align: center
